text:
[Verse]
Lights are shining bright
Hearts are beating loud
I'm just another face
Lost here in the crowd

[Verse 2]
People pass me by
Voices form a cloud
Searching for a sign
Lost here in the crowd

[Chorus]
Oh oh dancing alone
Oh oh finding my zone
Oh oh losing control
Lost here in the crowd

[Bridge]
Feet keep moving fast
Feel the rhythm now
Time can barely last
Lost here in the crowd

[Verse 3]
City's pulse is high
Smiles are flashing proud
I'm just chasing time
Lost here in the crowd

[Chorus]
Oh oh dancing alone
Oh oh finding my zone
Oh oh losing control
Lost here in the crowd
title: Lost in the Crowd
